links.title: link to no_op jobs, see upstream jobs)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(ts,$__interval),
  count(result) AS "result"
FROM noop_builds
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts) AND
  success = 0 AND
  type = "upstream"
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(ts,$__interval)

panels.title: no_op upstream jobs ( should always pass )

links.title: link to no_op jobs, see ovb jobs)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(ts,$__interval),
  count(result)
FROM noop_builds
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts) AND
  success = 0 AND
  type = 'rdo'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(ts,$__interval)

panels.title: no_op 3rd party jobs ( should always pass )

targets.rawSql: SELECT id, status, description, link from rr_bugs where tag = "promotion-blocker"

targets.query: SELECT "duration", "result", "log_url" FROM "autogen"."build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "job_name", "branch", "pipeline", "change"

targets.rawSql: SELECT id, status, description, link from rr_bugs where tag = "alert"

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  job,
  type,
  result,
  log_url
FROM noop_builds
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts) AND
  branch = $releases AND
  success = 0
ORDER BY ts

  branch = 'master'
